disease_name: Glycogen storage disease due to liver glycogen phosphorylase deficiency

socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: Observational retrospective case study of long-term clinical outcomes and complications
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: The natural history of glycogen storage disease types VI and IX: Long-term outcome from the largest metabolic center in Canada

socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: Single-center retrospective chart review of long-term outcomes and complications
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: Over 20-Year Follow-up of Patients with Hepatic Glycogen Storage Diseases: Single-Center Experience

socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: Systematic literature review of clinical phenotypes and genotypes of GSD VI
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: The Phenotypic and Genetic Spectrum of Glycogen Storage Disease Type VI

justification: Only qualitative descriptive clinical studies are available describing disease burden and long-term outcomes, with no peer-reviewed cost-of-illness data for GSD VI, thus assigned a low evidence level.
